description:
It's extremely slow, video goes out of sync, it has a UI that makes the text bounce constantly which is annoying, lacks shortcuts to mass edit text.

I haven't even had the time to use the software, at least it doesn't crash like the buggy software KDE produces. Still this tool can't be used
